00:12.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Atheros Communications Inc. AR5413/AR5414 
        Wireless Network Adapter [AR5006X(S) 802.11abg] [168c:001b] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Wistron NeWeb Corp. DCMA-82 High Power WLAN 802.11a/b/g 
        mini-PCI Module (Super A/G, eXtended Range, 400mW) [185f:1600]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 41
        Memory at 10000000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
[   12.610000] ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x0
[   12.610000] ath: EEPROM indicates default country code should be used
[   12.610000] ath: doing EEPROM country->regdmn map search
[   12.610000] ath: country maps to regdmn code: 0x3a
[   12.610000] ath: Country alpha2 being used: US
[   12.610000] ath: Regpair used: 0x3a
[   12.610000] ath5k: phy0: Atheros AR5414 chip found (MAC: 0xa5, PHY: 0x61)
